meanings.sent1: The rabbit hightailed across the field to escape the fox.
meanings.sent2: She hightailed it to the bus stop before it left.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hightailed away from the nut thief.
meanings.sent4: The students hightailed out of the classroom when the bell rang.
meanings.sent5: The wind hightailed through the trees, rustling the leaves.

meanings.sent1: The cat hightailed out of the room when the vacuum cleaner started.
meanings.sent2: They hightailed from the party when they heard the police sirens.
meanings.sent3: The dog hightailed from the bath, splashing water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The birds hightailed south for the winter, seeking warmer weather.
meanings.sent5: The thief hightailed with the loot, disappearing into the night.
